# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is the website of the second edition **in progress** and **in Spanish** of Teaching Tech Together.

In each chapter, you will find a note at the beginning that tells you its state: complete, in progress, being restructured, or in draft. This will help you decide whether to read the content and contribute (we are always very grateful for your feedback.

We use a [Code of Conduct for Contributors](https://contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html) in this book. If you contribute to it, you agree to abide by its terms.
